DataElement.preferredName: Laboratory Procedure Coagulation Process Specimen Collected Date
DataElement.preferredDefinition: The response regarding the date that a blood sample was collected for testing coagulation factors interacting to form a fibrin clot.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Laboratory Procedure Coagulation Process Specimen Collected
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: Any procedure that involves testing or manipulating a sample of blood, urine, or other body substance in a laboratory setting._Any of the sequential processes by which coagulation factors interact to form a fibrin clot._A part of a thing, or of several things, taken to demonstrate or to determine the character of the whole, e.g. a substance, or portion of material obtained for use in testing, examination, or study; particularly, a preparation of tissue or bodily fluid taken for examination or diagnosis._Collected; brought together in one place.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A procedure for critical evaluation; a means of determining the presence, quality, or truth of something.

Concepts.definition: Any procedure that involves testing or manipulating a sample of blood, urine, or other body substance in a laboratory setting.

Property.preferredDefinition: Any of the sequential processes by which coagulation factors interact to form a fibrin clot.:A part of a thing, or of several things, taken to demonstrate or to determine the character of the whole, e.g. a substance, or portion of material obtained for use in testing, examination, or study; particularly, a preparation of tissue or bodily fluid taken for examination or diagnosis.:Collected; brought together in one place.

Concepts.definition: Any of the sequential processes by which coagulation factors interact to form a fibrin clot.

A part of a thing, or of several things, taken to demonstrate or to determine the character of the whole, e.g. a substance, or portion of material obtained for use in testing, examination, or study; particularly, a preparation of tissue or bodily fluid taken for examination or diagnosis.
Collected; brought together in one place.

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: a particular day specified as the time something has, or will, happen.

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: a particular day specified as the time something has, or will, happen.

Concepts.definition: The particular day, month and year an event has happened or will happen.
